info.description: REST API for OpenVPN user, group, and network management
info.title: OpenVPN Manager API

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get users in a group. Admin sees all. Manager sees only subordinates in the group. User sees only themselves if member.

post.description: Add a user to a group. Admin can add anyone. Manager can only add their subordinates.

delete.description: Remove a user from a group. Admin can remove anyone. Manager can only remove their subordinates.

get.description: Get a network by ID (Admin only)
Get all groups assigned to a network (Admin only)

post.description: Add a group to a network (Admin only)

delete.description: Remove a group from a network (Admin only)

get.description: List users with pagination. Admin sees all users. Manager sees only subordinates. User sees only themselves.

post.description: Create a new user (Admin or Manager). Managers can only create users assigned to themselves.

put.description: Update a user. Admin can update anyone. Manager can update their subordinates. User cannot use this endpoint.

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token. Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs..."
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
